content.rendered:
• Amitinerary is a individual travel agency to provide support and we help customers to get their tickets from their desired travel company by comparing prices from all Online platforms where they can purchase tickets. We also provide them 24/7 support as they can directly contact us on our toll free numbers and change their ticket dates and even they can cancel their tickets. We are not part of any travel service provider like Greyhound, Amtrak or any other Companies those are providing Travel solutions to customers.
  • We are charging our order processing fees to the customer for taking care of their order and help them to get best services during the travel and resolve all the queries of customers on the call.
  • We help customers to change their journey date and even customer can also change their booking date by calling on our number and we will help them to change the date according to their will. There might be some charges while changing date or cancelling the date (that will be charged by the travel company) not by Easy and Safe Journey. We offer 24/7 customer support service and we also helps customer to share their feedback after journey ends.
  • We are working 24/7 for the customer support and you can simply call on our number and get your queries resolved. Chat options are also provided for booking your ticket and we allow customer to pay their ticket price directly to Travel company as well.
  • We are offering rewards based system to customer as well in which they can earn with us by referring their known ones to our company and they get our commission waved off in their next travel journey.
  • Customers can easily purchase our monthly and yearly plan in which they can save their good amount of money. once customer purchase our plan, they will not require to pay our processing fees for rest of the period which the choose. Customers can easily purchase our different plans in which they can huge amount in our commissions while booking their tickets.

Call us

+1-8885527778
